name: Select Energy Services, Inc.
description: Select Energy Services, Inc. is a leading provider of water solutions for the oil and gas industry, focused on delivering integrated water management services across the entire lifecycle of water in hydraulic fracturing operations. Established in 2016 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Select Energy Services operates through a comprehensive network of water sourcing, transportation, and disposal services to enhance efficiency and sustainability in the energy sector. The company's commitment to environmentally responsible practices is evident in its innovative technologies that promote water conservation and reclamation. Select Energy Services offers a range of services including water logistics, water treatment, and the development and operation of water infrastructure. With an emphasis on safety and operational excellence, the company aims to support its clients in maximizing their production while minimizing their environmental footprint. As the demand for sustainable practices in the energy industry grows, Select Energy Services is well-positioned to deliver high-quality water solutions that align with the evolving needs of its customers.
